website_summaries.verdict: Great for kids or kids at heart, this model is true to the cartoon classic and comes in a box for gifting.
pros: Made of lead-free poly resin, this ornament is set to become a keepsake
Collect the set – part of a range of TV classic ornaments that also includes Buddy the Elf, Frosty, the leg lamp from A Christmas Story and more
cons: The Polar Express ticket ornament is a bit cheap looking

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: This is an authentic Hallmark ornament, which came new in package. It's branded with the Friends TV show logo as well. The cup is a nice size. The Central Perk logo/image is on the front and back of the ornament, and it has a sturdy red handle and red inner lining. The coffee on the inside is swirled with the FRIENDS logo across it. The red ribbon ornament hanger is attached to a small silver ring set just at where the top of the handle meets the cup. This series of ornaments is pricey, but it does make a great gift for a fan of the show.
customer_reviews.author: Tia R

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: The item that came to me looked nothing like the picture. It was a Polar Express ornament, but it was a tacky yellow-orange plastic sign with a train on it. It looked cheap, but unfortunately I had to give it to my husband anyway because there wasn't time before our party to get him another one.
customer_reviews.author: PPN

customer_reviews.title: A miniature replica of the iconic Leg Lamp!  A must for any Christmas Story fan.
customer_reviews.text: You either know what this ornament is or you don't! It's the classic leg lamp from the all time great Christmas Story movie. I have threatened my mother in law with a life size leg lamp for years and when I saw the ornament I knew it was a must have. I put it on her tree and waited for her to notice. This is an iconic ornament that is more novelty than family heirloom but it is well made and the right size for a christmas tree!
customer_reviews.author: W. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for someone and when they got it they absolutely loved it since they like snowman ornaments. Not to small nor big the perfect size to hang on a Christmas tree. I don't know how to describe the material because it does not seem plastic nor porcelain.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure I just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Friends ornament as a gift, and when it arrived, the handle of the mug was not really made well, it stuck out a little bit. Since it was a gift, and I needed to send it quickly I just kept it, since it didn't seem like it was going to break. Hopefully the recipient doesn't notice.
customer_reviews.author: Federica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with trains, the Polar Express and Golden Tickets!! Received in the box like we saw in the store, but can't get everything we want at the store, especially when it's going to be his Christmas ornament for this year (every year I get everyone in our family something that was a milestone in the past year) - his was his first train ride!!
customer_reviews.author: Shantel Berns-Walters

customer_reviews.title: Finally, our tree is complete
customer_reviews.text: After putting up our tree and realizing we didn't have a Leg Lamp ornament, I went on a quest to find the perfect one. A lot of retailers have a few different designs, but this one was so classy, inexpensive, and well made. No glitter to fall off! My husband and kids loved seeing it up on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maclauchlan

customer_reviews.title: BUDDY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute & sturdy ornament. My brother’s fave Xmas movie, so he thought the ornament was great. The only thing different is that the metal loop attached to the ornament (for hanging it) is right in the middle of the yellow band. I had wanted to paint my nephew’s name on the band, but it was no use. That’s why I give it a 4, not a 5.
customer_reviews.author: lou e

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Christmas Story decoration
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these one for my niece in Florida and one for us. Very durable very cute. A nice addition to the Christmas tree and memories of winters in Ohio! The Christmas story house in Cleveland Ohio!!
customer_reviews.author: peggy m.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a good ornament. One side is the ticket and that side looks good and it is a great quality. Where it falls short for me is on the other side with the train. It looks very cheap and I was a little disappointed when I saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Loved the detail
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a friend who love abominable from the Rudolph movies. The detail was fantastic, this was cheaper than in the stores, and it was pretty lightweight but a bit heftier than we anticipated. just required making sure we placed it on the right tree branch. She was super excited and loved the ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Christal NavarreTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: My family watches A Christmas Story every year. This was the perfect gift. It came in an official box and was the perfect size for the tree. Great quality, not tacky or cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Kbiggs

customer_reviews.title: Super cute gift idea for a “Friends” fan
customer_reviews.text: So, I got this for my wife (as well as a few related products) and we love it. I thought since “Friends” is her favorite show and Christmas is her favorite holiday that it would be a hit. And it was. She loved it. The packaging was immaculate. The product itself was in great shape, everything was in order. Super cute little gift, I’d recommend it to anyone who’s considering this.
customer_reviews.author: John Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, product needs some work
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea but the color of the product is not bright, like pictured or in the movie. A bit smaller than expected for an ornament.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the FRIENDS lover in your life!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the FRIENDS lover in your life. I love that it has F.R.I.E.N.D.S inscribed in the coffee. It is heavy, but seems very durable and was easy to hang. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrito87

customer_reviews.title: Such a cute ornament!!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute ornament! My daughter loved it! A lot of reviews talk about how small it is but keep in mind, it’s an ornament NOT the actual mug!! If you love the movie you need this on your tree!!
customer_reviews.author: whc54

customer_reviews.title: Cute, arrived in great condition!
customer_reviews.text: We have a family tradition of purchasing a Hallmark ornament each year. This ornament was for my new daughter-in-law, who is a Friends fanatic. The ornament arrived safely, well packaged, and was exactly as I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie T Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Was initially worried it would be small. Gave as ornament exchange gift and everyone said it was the best one there.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable!! I have a friend that was trying to get me into the Christmas spirit this year - I just wasn't in the mood. He sent me gif's of Buddy so much, that I thought this ornament was a perfect Thank you gift for him. It is so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn B

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! My favorite ornament!!
customer_reviews.text: This came packaged nicely and very quickly. The ornament itself is absolutely perfect! It is so cute and looks great on the tree!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the friends lover in your life!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually much nicer in person than it appears in the photo! It seemed to be nice quality and is so cute. I gave this to my BFF and she loved it.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my friend for Christmas. It came quick and was packaged soundly. The quality of work is good. I did not open the package so I can’t speak for the overall durability but it seems to be of a pretty solid material !
customer_reviews.author: Ithaca Robinson.

customer_reviews.title: CUTE Christmas tree decoration.
customer_reviews.text: Ornament was described. Grandkids loved putting it on the tree. We used them to announce a Christmas time day trip in pajamas on the Polar Express out of New Orleans.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cruthird

customer_reviews.title: Won't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Since this is a Hallmark ornament I expected it to come in a box. It did not. Once I unwrapped it, I saw that it had dirt on it, so I had to clean it off. And there is a small dent on the bottom. Worst ornament I have ever bought off Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Product is very small
customer_reviews.text: I love this ornament as I’m a huge friends fan. It’s adorable I just wish it was a little bigger. It is very small (smaller than I expected). Still though it is very cute!

product_meta.title: Hallmark Christmas Ornament Rudolph The Red Nosed Reindeer Bumble The Abominable Snow Monster
product_meta.description: Color:Abominable Snow MonsterHolding the gold star to place atop the Christmas tree, Bumble is adorable all wrapped up in a colorful light string. Inspired by the holiday classic "Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer" he's a great addition to adorn your holiday decor. Hallmark Christmas Ornaments celebrate characters from contemporary and classic movies, TV shows, toys and entertainment. Made of polyresin, this Hallmark Ornament measures 1.5 x 3 x 1.5 inches and comes in a 3.5 x 4.7 x 2.5 gift box. The ornament is ready to hang on your Christmas tree with a ribbon hanger. Perfect gift for fans of the lovable monster Bumble from "Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer." Each piece includes one Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer Bumble the Abominable Snow Monster Christmas Ornament in a gift-ready box. Hallmark Christmas Ornaments are a great way to commemorate individual interests and those that you share with family and friends. Hallmark has been your family-owned creator of greeting cards, gifts, gift wrap and more for over 100 years. We take deep pride in helping individuals connect in just the right way. This Hallmark Christmas Ornament is lead-free.
feature_bullets: Holding a star to place atop the Christmas tree, Bumble is all wrapped up in lights. Inspired by the holiday classic "Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer," he's an adorable addition to your holiday decor.
Hallmark Christmas Ornaments celebrate characters from contemporary and classic movies, TV shows, toys and entertainment.
Made of polyresin, this Hallmark Ornament measures 1.5 x 3 x 1.5 inches and comes in a 3.5 x 4.7 x 2.5 gift box. The ornament is ready to hang on your Christmas tree with a ribbon hanger.
Perfect gift for fans of the lovable monster Bumble from "Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer."
Each piece includes one Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer Bumble the Abominable Snow Monster Christmas Ornament in a gift-ready box.
